Layout/MultilineMethodCallBraceLayout.description:
Description

Checks that the closing brace in a method call is either on the same line as the last method argument, or a new line.
Layout/MultilineMethodCallBraceLayout.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: symmetrical (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['symmetrical', 'new_line', 'same_line'] (type: list)
